contents.description: Bar Citizen was first held in 2015 as an event for Star Citizen lovers to gather and enjoy together. Bar Citizen, in Korea, was started in 2019 and has been held ever since. A delicious foods and drinks will be served in a comfortable space, where participants can talk about various Star Citizen news and build friendships.

features.title: Is this your first time?
features.description: Let me tell you what you can do at Bar Citizen Korea!

description.title: Foods and Drinks
description.description1: Choose and share food with the people around you and get to know each other.
description.description2: A variety of food and drinks are waiting for you. Please note that food allergens are not marked and vegetarian options are not provided.

description.title: Talking about game
description.description1: You can talk about Star Citizen and share tips with each other.
description.description2: If you ever meet a rival, please let the staff know. Our staff will help you achieve your revenge through some board games.

description.title: Building friendships
description.description1: Stop playing alone. Make new friends through board games.
description.description2: For smooth event progress, only adults over the age of 19 can participate, and your lovely pets are not allowed to enter the venue.

sponsor_users.title: These are the people who supported event.
sponsor_users.description: These are messages of support from those who helped Bar Citizen Korea.

title: Bar Citizen Korea
Register Now!
description: Bar Citizen Korea to be held in 2023 is with more people. Meet friends or make new friends in a larger space.
Just like last year, the staff of Cloud Imperium Games will be joining us this year too!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions.
faq.description: Here are answers to questions many people have asked.

contacts.description: If you can't find your question in our FAQ, please ask us on Discord!

sponsor_fleets.description: The Korean Star Citizen organizations helped this event.

location.title: Let's meet in Incheon.
location.description: Only those who have registration can enter.

footer.title: Bar Citizen Korea
